arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْنِيْ فِيْهِ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ وَالْاَقْذَارِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] purify me against filth and dirt;
And grant me on this day steadfastness against vicissitude of time,
And lead me on this day to piety and companionship of the upright ones;
Out of Your assistance; O the delight of the poor ones.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma ṭahhir-nī fīhi minad danasi wal-aqdhār
